name: Ogolvie and the Titanic Tooth
description:
My final Game Design II project! You are fighting the Titanic Tooth, and if you don't do it the right way, you're going to lose!

WASD to move around, X to reset the level. Space to Jump

(At the end, the Titanic Tooth is supposed to congratulate you, but it seems he got hit too hard on the head...)
